CustomField.description: This is the last name of the user that answered the call.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the call recipient is a Natterbox User, this will be their last name as it appears in the Natterbox Portal. If the call is outbound to an external number, this will be blank. NOTE: This name is NOT pulled from Salesforce but from the Natterbox system.
CustomField.label: ConnectedLastName
